status: Stakeholders are informed of an issue affecting the "crashy" pod, which is currently in a CrashLoopBackOff state, impacting service availability in the oncall-sandbox-control-plane region. The issue has persisted for approximately 39 minutes. We are actively investigating the root cause and reviewing warning events related to the pod. A follow-up update will be provided as soon as more information is available, with the next update time TBD.
